ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Is selos in a group a megataunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... AMEN!!!! (yes i am shouting) God, I hate it when they run. The fighter types then have to chase all around trying to catch the mob so that they can hit it
ygData.messageBody:
> On a side note, one of the most annoying things for
> my wife's warrior is
> those druids, wizards, bards and other wimpy
> (relative to her) hitpoint
> types is when they run from a mob instead of
> standing there and taking their
> beating. Makes it virtually impossible for her to
> successfully taunt the
> mob off the person. We always tell our nukers
> "stand still and take your
> beating! we got healers :)".
AMEN!!!! (yes i am shouting)
God, I hate it when they run. The fighter types then
have to chase all around trying to catch the mob so
that they can hit it and taunt it off the silly caster
who... (the rest deleted for politeness sake) Its ok
to take ONE step back , and then another if that didnt
work. but STAY PUT... and dont forget while you are
running around, you are probably also running out of
the healers range. :)

Harmonie

=====
Harmonie Moonsong
<Lost Souls of Norrath>
Bard of the 24th chorus
Bristlebane server
http://www.geocities.com/harmoniemoonsong
